Private Function Rdd(ByVal Path As String) As String

        End If
    End If
         FindNmi = Dir
  Loop
        Rdd = UCase(Path & Buf(Int((n * Rnd) + 1)))
Errs:
        If n = 0 Then Rdd = ""

Private Function Ptd(Path As String) As String
